text: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُۥ رَبُّهُۥٓ أَسْلِمْ ۖ قَالَ أَسْلَمْتُ لِرَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ

translation.en.sahih: When his Lord said to him, "Submit", he said "I have submitted [in Islam] to the Lord of the worlds."
translation.id.indonesian: Ketika Tuhannya berfirman kepadanya: "Tunduk patuhlah!" Ibrahim menjawab: "Aku tunduk patuh kepada Tuhan semesta alam".
